channel.title: Railway Line on Combinant
channel.description: Recent content in Railway Line on Combinant

item.title: CFL Multimodal connection
item.description: FLYER train cfl mm antwerpen belgium 20160122 from UIRR

item.title: NEW train connection between Combinant and Zeebrugge
item.description: Combinant is proud to announce that Hupac will start as from July 6th a direct connection towards Zeebrugge.

item.title: Direct connection towards Busto
item.description: Dear Customer, As from September 2013, Hupac will organise 4x per week a roundtrip between Combinant and Busto. Please find below the flyer.

item.title: Additional roundtrip Verona train
item.description: Dear users, As from June the 4th the number of roundtrips towards Verona will be increased from 3 towards 4 roundtrips per week. In annex you find the flyer of Hupac/Cemat for this connection. Please do not hesitate to contact them for further information. Combinant nv

item.title: New train connection Combinant - Busto
item.description: Dear All, As from 11 March 2013, Hupac started up a daily direct connection between Combinant and Busto. This connection will have 5 roundtrips per week and will have a A - C connection with Italy. Closing at Combinant is foreseen at 20u45 from Monday till Friday. Pick up at Combinant is foreseen on Monday from 10AM and from Tuesday till Friday at 06AM. Please contact Hupac for further details. See flyer attached.

item.title: Start up Novara train
item.description: Dear Users, As from January 2013, IFB started with a daily connection from Combinant towards Novara. Departures foreseen on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Saturday. Arrivals foreseen on MOnday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday. Please contact IFB for further information : lode.de.coster@interferryboats.be Best regards, Combinant nv

item.title: New train connection Antwerp - Barcelona
item.description: Dear all, Message from Hupac. "Dear customers, Please find attached our flyer concerning the new shuttle connection Ant- werp <=> Barcelona that will replace the current service Antwerp <=> Perpignan." Best regards, Combinant nv Flyer antwerp barcelona View more documents from Combinant.

item.title: New train connection Antwerp - Dourges
item.description: As from March 7th, Naviland started up a new service from Antwerp towards Dourges with direct connections within France. Naviland flyer View more presentations from Combinant.

item.title: flash info from Hupac concerning Hendaye train
item.description: Mail from Hupac concerning train Hendaye> Mail hupac concering Hendaye View more documents from Combinant.
